title: Download Cloud Cost Reports package
content:
The Cloud Cost Reports package includes prebuilt cloud cost reports. Download the package and upload it in Operations Cloud to view cloud cost reports.

To download the Cloud Cost Reports package:

  1. Go to the Marketplace.
  2. Download the Cloud Cost Reports package. This package includes the following files:

  • finops-reports-x.x.x.zip - Contains the prebuilt cloud cost reports for AWS, Azure, and OCI.

  • FinOps_schema.xlsx - Contains the schema information used by the cloud cost reports. This file is required when building new predefined queries for custom reports in Operations Cloud.

Related topics

  • Upload the Cloud Cost Reports package.
